text: Lom rasul Tuhan gopnyan Neupeugah Rasul Tuhan bak Bani Israil Tanda bak Rabbi nyoe lon peuleumah Lon peugot ticem nibak tanoh kliet Lon buliet-buliet lon pruh lon rajah Ka jeut keu ticem jipe le ligat Nyan saboh ayat ngon izin Allah Jeut lon peupuleh lom ureueng buta Ngon seupot lanja puleh le bagah Jeut lon peuudep ureueng nyang mate Kon deungon sihe ngon izin Allah Lom pih lon peugah peue nyang tapajoh Lom peue nyang tatroh nyang jeut takeubah Nyang jeut takeubah di rumoh gata Bandum sigala abeh lon peugah Di sinan sit jeut keu saboh tanda Meunyo na gata iman keu Allah
